body_html:
@goldingn, Let me look into supporting this feature.
@alexggmatthews, @dustinvtran is working with Bayesflow team. Everyone has been involved in getting HMC implemented but currently Matt Hoffman (and to a much lesser extent, myself) did the work of implementing HMC. Over the coming months we'll all continue to improve and extend its functionality.
body_text:
@goldingn, Let me look into supporting this feature.
@alexggmatthews, @dustinvtran is working with Bayesflow team.  Everyone has been involved in getting HMC implemented but currently Matt Hoffman (and to a much lesser extent, myself) did the work of implementing HMC. Over the coming months we'll all continue to improve and extend its functionality.
body:
@goldingn, Let me look into supporting this feature.
@alexggmatthews, @dustinvtran is working with Bayesflow team.  Everyone has been involved in getting HMC implemented but currently Matt Hoffman (and to a much lesser extent, myself) did the work of implementing HMC. Over the coming months we'll all continue to improve and extend its functionality.
